title: FTTH_FIB-Tool concept and implementation GUI, location mgt & IDB topics (Q2/25)
description:
Description
Further requirements for the FIB tool, where concept and implementation to be done Q2/2025 will be descripted here:
(with focus on finalization interfaces to POM/IDB and PreOrder@Cloud, FIB-tool GUI functionality and migration from Interimssolution)
Overview of topics (details see checklist below)
location management (workflow) (replacement existing Panda Location Mgt with FIB-Tool)
FIB-Tool will be accessible via Panda Account
Preparation of all necessary steps for GoLive of FIB-Tool
Capability "Verf√ºgbarkeitscheck" using PreOrder@Cloud interface
Capability "Interessenten Management" using interface to POM/IDB (TechPOM)
Migration from FTTH Interimssolution Interessentenerfassung to FIB-Tool
interface to GIGA GS (FIO) for "Standardbauweise" see https://jira.telekom.de/browse/SDN-24218
out-of-scope in first MVP for FIB-Tool
no Public and Classified customers with extra security requirements 
no access for Offshore colleagues
no Geo-customers
Expand "Standardbauweise" for GK-customer
Wholebuy  
FIB Stand alone?          
Self.Service
